接口的使用
com.netease.stream.auth.Credentials

  • 使用Credentials的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    com.netease.stream.auth  

    • com.netease.stream.auth中Credentials的使用

      实现Credentials的com.netease.stream.auth中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  BasicCredentials
      Basic implementation of the Credentials interface that allows callers to pass in the access key and secret access in the constructor.
      返回Credentials的com.netease.stream.auth中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Credentials StaticCredentialsProvider.getCredentials() 
      Credentials CredentialsProvider.getCredentials()
      Returns Credentials which the caller can use to authorize an request.
      protected Credentials AbstractStringSigner.sanitizeCredentials(Credentials credentials)
      Loads the individual access key ID and secret key from the specified credentials, ensuring that access to the credentials is synchronized on the credentials object itself, and trimming any extra whitespace from the credentials.
      protected Credentials AbstractSigner.sanitizeCredentials(Credentials credentials)
      Loads the individual access key ID and secret key from the specified credentials, ensuring that access to the credentials is synchronized on the credentials object itself, and trimming any extra whitespace from the credentials.
      参数类型为Credentials的com.netease.stream.auth中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      protected Credentials AbstractStringSigner.sanitizeCredentials(Credentials credentials)
      Loads the individual access key ID and secret key from the specified credentials, ensuring that access to the credentials is synchronized on the credentials object itself, and trimming any extra whitespace from the credentials.
      protected Credentials AbstractSigner.sanitizeCredentials(Credentials credentials)
      Loads the individual access key ID and secret key from the specified credentials, ensuring that access to the credentials is synchronized on the credentials object itself, and trimming any extra whitespace from the credentials.
      void StreamSigner.sign(Request request, Credentials credentials)
      Sign request with credentials.
      void Signer.sign(Request request, Credentials credentials)
